product_name: Park Home Mechanic Bike Repair Stand
long_description: This Park(R) repair stand for the home mechanic is built with special upgrades to make set up, take down, and use faster and easier. Cam-type clamp allows single-action clamping of tubes from 7/8 to 3 inches (24 to 76mm); clamping pressure is fully adjustable. Composite top tube ensures smooth 360deg clamp rotation. Quick-release height adjustment from 39 to 57 inches, (99 to 145cm). Folds to 41 inches (104cm) for portability and storage. Three-point leg system with reinforced center yoke for superior stability. Sliding retention rings lock folding legs in place.
short_description: This Park(R) repair stand for the home mechanic is built with special upgrades to make set up, take down, and use faster and easier.
